item.title: Mike add a quote by Kevin Hearne
item.description: "Yer a good lad, Atticus, mowin’ me lawn and killin’ what Brits come around." -- Kevin Hearne

item.title: Mike add a quote by Kevin Hearne
item.description: "Now go and stake some vamps. Especially the sparkly emo ones." -- Kevin Hearne

item.title: Mike add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Mike add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Mike add a quote by Don Juan Matus
item.description: "A warrior acknowledges his pain but he doesn't indulge in it. The mood of the warrior who enters into the unknown is not one of sadness; on the contrary, he's joyful because he feels humbled by his great fortune, confident that his spirit is impeccable, and above all, fully aware of his efficiency. A warrior's joyfulness comes from having accepted his fate, and from having truthfully assessed what lies ahead of him." -- Don Juan Matus
